arts.ttl: Roma Starlet Fulfills Childhood Dream in Lecce Thrashing
arts.sum: Homegrown Roma starlet Niccolo Pisilli came off the bench to score his second Serie A goal this season in a 4-1 thumping of Lecce. Claudio Ranieri posted his first victory since returning to the Stadio Olimpico for the third time following a three-match winless start. The post Roma Starlet Fulfills Childhood Dream in Lecce Thrashing appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eyeing Lecce's Dorgu
arts.sum: Manchester United have joined the race to sign Patrick Dorgu, while Chelsea and Arsenal are eyeing a summer move for Brazilian wonderkid Vitor Reis . - Palmeiras defender Vitor Reis is a potential transfer target for Arsenal and Chelsea next summer, reports Florian Plettenberg .
